definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

pinyin: Fa3 shu3 Bo1 li4 ni2 xi1 ya4

sentences.english: Niue belonging to the Polynesian Islands, New Zealand and maintain the Compact of Free Association.
sentences.chinese: 紐埃屬於波利尼西亞羣島，與新西蘭保持自由聯繫。

sentences.english: We were attracted by the amazing performance of the Polynesian dancers.
sentences.chinese: 我們被波利尼西亞舞蹈演員精彩的表演所吸引。
來自曼格雷哇島的波利尼西亞樂隊。

sentences.english: We look forward to welcoming you to Polynesian Spa.
sentences.chinese: 我們期待着歡迎你來到波利尼西亞溫泉。
